name: SatisfactionGuaranteed
description:
Satisfaction Guaranteed: A literal community builder!
As a neighborhood planner it's your job to find a middle ground for new residents before breaking ground. Drag and drop tile pieces to find peace!

This project was made in Godot in 48 hours for the 2022 wholesome game jam

Thanks to contributors:

Iain - Programming/Game Design/Art direction/Project management
https://twitter.com/IainMacQuarrie

HeyGingerDee - Character Dialogue /Game Design
https://twitter.com/HeyGingerDee

BibiXP - Music, Spritework, Game Design
https://twitter.com/Bibi_XP_music

Nanceh - UI, SFX,  Character Designs, Game Design
https://twitter.com/Chaotic_Nancy

Yinwa - Logo design
https://amiycai.com/

Using the Dialogic plugin for Godot: https://github.com/coppolaemilio/dialogic
